languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс чуть склоняет голову и начинает говорить тише.{/n} "Присутствие рядом с тобой — испытание для меня. Испытание, к которому я готов не был и потому даже говорить о нем мне... сложно. Как и обо всем, что касается моих желаний, а не обязанностей и долга. Ибо последние стоят превыше меня. Прошу тебя, {name}..." {n}Он колеблется секунду. Потом берет вашу руку, подносит к губам и нежно целует ваши пальцы.{/n} "В нашем положении я могу позволить себе... весьма немного. И ты, на самом деле — тоже. Просто... позволь мне быть рядом и помогать тебе. Этого для меня уже достаточно".

{n}Heinrix inclines his head slightly and begins to speak more quietly:{/n} "Being near you is a trial for me. A trial I was not prepared for, and so even speaking of it is... difficult for me. As it always is when it concerns my own desires, rather than my responsibilities and obligations. My duty comes first, even before myself. Please, {name}..." {n}He hesitates for a second. Then he takes your hand, brings it to his lips, and tenderly kisses your fingers.{/n} "In our position, I can allow myself... very little. And for you it is no different, really. Just... let me be here for you and help you. That is more than enough for me."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс чуть склоняет голову и начинает говорить тише.{/n} "Присутствие рядом с тобой — испытание для меня. Прошу тебя, {name}..." {n}Он колеблется секунду. Потом берет вашу руку, подносит к губам и нежно целует ваши пальцы.{/n} "В нашем положении я могу позволить себе... весьма немного. И ты, на самом деле — тоже. Просто... позволь мне быть рядом и помогать тебе. Этого для меня уже достаточно".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix inclina ligeramente la cabeza y continúa hablando en voz baja:{/n} «Estar a tu lado es como una ordalía para mí. Una para la que no estaba preparado; por eso hablar del tema me resulta tan... difícil. Como siempre ha sido en lo tocante a mis propios deseos, y no a mis responsabilidades y obligaciones. Mi deber es lo primero, antes incluso que yo mismo. Por favor, {name}...». {n}La duda le asalta durante un breve instante. Luego te toma de la mano, se la lleva a los labios y besa tus dedos con ternura.{/n} «En nuestra situación, puedo permitirme... muy poco. Y para ti tampoco es diferente. Solo... déjame estar aquí para ti, déjame ayudarte. Para mí ya es más que suficiente».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix inclines his head slightly and begins to speak more quietly:{/n} "Being near you is a trial for me. A trial I was not prepared for, and so even speaking of it is... difficult for me. As it always is when it concerns my own desires, rather than my responsibilities and obligations. My duty comes first, even before myself. Please, {name}..." {n}He hesitates for a second. Then he takes your hand, brings it to his lips, and tenderly kisses your fingers.{/n} "In our position, I can allow myself... very little. And for you it is no different, really. Just... let me be here for you and help you. That is more than enough for me."

Una para la que no estaba preparado; por eso hablar del tema me resulta tan... difícil. Como siempre ha sido en lo tocante a mis propios deseos, y no a mis responsabilidades y obligaciones. Mi deber es lo primero, antes incluso que yo mismo. Por favor, {name}...». {n}La duda le asalta durante un breve instante. Luego te toma de la mano, se la lleva a los labios y besa tus dedos con ternura.{/n} «En nuestra situación, puedo permitirme... muy poco. Y para ti tampoco es diferente. Solo... déjame estar aquí para ti, déjame ayudarte. Para mí ya es más que suficiente».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは首を少し傾げ、より静かに話し始めた。{/n}「あなたの近くにいるのは試練だ。まったく予期していなかった試練だし、この話をするだけでも…俺にとっては苦しい。責任や義務ではなく、自分の欲望に関わるときはいつもそうだ。俺は何よりも任務を優先する。お願いだ、{name}…」{n}彼は数秒間、躊躇する。そしてこちらの手をとり、彼の唇に当てて、指に優しくキスをした。{/n}「我々の立場上、私からこれ以上のことをするのは…難しい。それはあなたも同じだ。ただ…こうやって側にいて、あなたを支えさせてくれ。それで十分だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix inclines his head slightly and begins to speak more quietly:{/n} "Being near you is a trial for me. A trial I was not prepared for, and so even speaking of it is... difficult for me. As it always is when it concerns my own desires, rather than my responsibilities and obligations. My duty comes first, even before myself. Please, {name}..." {n}He hesitates for a second. Then he takes your hand, brings it to his lips, and tenderly kisses your fingers.{/n} "In our position, I can allow myself... very little. And for you it is no different, really. Just... let me be here for you and help you. That is more than enough for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは首を少し傾げ、より静かに話し始めた。{/n}「あなたの近くにいるのは試練だ。まったく予期していなかった試練だし、この話をするだけでも…俺にとっては苦しい。責任や義務ではなく、自分の欲望に関わるときはいつもそうだ。俺は何よりも任務を優先する。お願いだ、{name}…」{n}彼は数秒間、躊躇する。そしてこちらの手をとり、彼の唇に当てて、指に優しくキスをした。{/n}「我々の立場上、私からこれ以上のことをするのは…難しい。それはあなたも同じだ。ただ…こうやって側にいて、あなたを支えさせてくれ。それで十分だ」

languages.text: {n}海因里希微微低下头，以更轻的声音说道。{/n}“对我而言，留在你身边就像是一场试炼，一场我还没准备好的试炼，哪怕仅仅是谈及这件事情……对我而言也非常困难。每当事情涉及到我的个人欲望，而非我的职责和义务时，就总是会变成这样。我的职责是最重要的，甚至比我自己都更重要。因此，拜托了，{name}……”{n}他犹豫片刻，随后牵起你的手，放在唇边，温柔地亲吻你的手指。{/n}“对我们这样的人而言，我只能……稍稍……放纵我自己，而你的处境与我没什么不同，真的。就……让我陪伴在你身旁，协助你吧。光是这样，我就已经心满意足了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix inclines his head slightly and begins to speak more quietly:{/n} "Being near you is a trial for me. A trial I was not prepared for, and so even speaking of it is... difficult for me. As it always is when it concerns my own desires, rather than my responsibilities and obligations. My duty comes first, even before myself. Please, {name}..." {n}He hesitates for a second. Then he takes your hand, brings it to his lips, and tenderly kisses your fingers.{/n} "In our position, I can allow myself... very little. And for you it is no different, really. Just... let me be here for you and help you. That is more than enough for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希微微低下头，以更轻的声音说道。{/n}“对我而言，留在你身边就像是一场试炼，一场我还没准备好的试炼，哪怕仅仅是谈及这件事情……对我而言也非常困难。每当事情涉及到我的个人欲望，而非我的职责和义务时，就总是会变成这样。我的职责是最重要的，甚至比我自己都更重要。因此，拜托了，{name}……”{n}他犹豫片刻，随后牵起你的手，放在唇边，温柔地亲吻你的手指。{/n}“对我们这样的人而言，我只能……稍稍……放纵我自己，而你的处境与我没什么不同，真的。就……让我陪伴在你身旁，协助你吧。光是这样，我就已经心满意足了。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix penche légèrement la tête et baisse la voix.{/n} « Me trouver à vos côtés est une épreuve pour moi, une épreuve à laquelle je n'étais pas préparé. Il m'est donc... difficile d'en parler, comme tout ce qui touche à mes désirs plutôt qu'à mes responsabilités ou mes obligations. Mon devoir passe avant tout, même ma propre vie. Je vous en prie, {name}... » {n}Il hésite un instant, puis prend votre main, la porte à ses lèves et embrasse tendrement vos doigts.{/n} « Au vu de notre situation, je ne peux pas me permettre grand-chose et il en va de même pour vous, mais... laissez-moi vous apporter mon aide et mon soutien. Cela me suffit amplement. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix inclines his head slightly and begins to speak more quietly:{/n} "Being near you is a trial for me. A trial I was not prepared for, and so even speaking of it is... difficult for me. As it always is when it concerns my own desires, rather than my responsibilities and obligations. My duty comes first, even before myself. Please, {name}..." {n}He hesitates for a second. Then he takes your hand, brings it to his lips, and tenderly kisses your fingers.{/n} "In our position, I can allow myself... very little. And for you it is no different, really. Just... let me be here for you and help you. That is more than enough for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix penche légèrement la tête et baisse la voix.{/n} « Me trouver à vos côtés est une épreuve pour moi, une épreuve à laquelle je n'étais pas préparé. Il m'est donc... difficile d'en parler, comme tout ce qui touche à mes désirs plutôt qu'à mes responsabilités ou mes obligations. Mon devoir passe avant tout, même ma propre vie. Je vous en prie, {name}... » {n}Il hésite un instant, puis prend votre main, la porte à ses lèves et embrasse tendrement vos doigts.{/n} « Au vu de notre situation, je ne peux pas me permettre grand-chose et il en va de même pour vous, mais... laissez-moi vous apporter mon aide et mon soutien. Cela me suffit amplement. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix neigt leicht den Kopf und spricht nun leiser:{/n} "In Eurer Nähe zu sein, ist für mich eine Prüfung. Eine Prüfung, auf die ich nicht vorbereitet war. Selbst darüber zu sprechen, ist ... schwer. Wie immer, wenn es um meine eigenen Begierden geht, statt um meine Pflichten und Aufgaben. Meine Pflicht steht über allem, selbst über mi selbst. Bitte, {name} ..." {n}Er zögert eine Sekunde. Dann nimmt er deine Hand, führt sie an seine Lippen, und küsst sanft deine Finger.{/n} "In unserer Position kann ich mir selbst nur sehr wenig zugestehen. Und für Euch ist es nicht anders. Aber ... lasst mich für Euch da sein, Euch helfen. Das reicht mir."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix inclines his head slightly and begins to speak more quietly:{/n} "Being near you is a trial for me. A trial I was not prepared for, and so even speaking of it is... difficult for me. As it always is when it concerns my own desires, rather than my responsibilities and obligations. My duty comes first, even before myself. Please, {name}..." {n}He hesitates for a second. Then he takes your hand, brings it to his lips, and tenderly kisses your fingers.{/n} "In our position, I can allow myself... very little. And for you it is no different, really. Just... let me be here for you and help you. That is more than enough for me."

Selbst darüber zu sprechen, ist ... schwer. Wie immer, wenn es um meine eigenen Begierden geht, statt um meine Pflichten und Aufgaben. Meine Pflicht steht über allem, selbst über mi selbst. Aber ... lasst mich für Euch da sein, Euch helfen. Das reicht mir."

A trial I was not prepared for, and so even speaking of it is... difficult for me. As it always is when it concerns my own desires, rather than my responsibilities and obligations. My duty comes first, even before myself. Please, ..." {n}He hesitates for a second. Then he takes your hand, brings it to his lips, and tenderly kisses your fingers.{/n} "In our position, I can allow myself... very little. And for you it is no different, really. Just... let me be here for you and help you. That is more than enough for me."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, başını hafifçe eğip alçak sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Yanında durduğum her an bir sınav. Hem de hiç çalışmadığım bir sınav. Öyle ki... Bunları söylerken bile çok zorlanıyorum. Gerçi söz konusu sorumluluğum yahut yükümlülüğüm değil de arzularım olduğunda hep zorlanırım. Vazifem; her şeyden, kendimden bile önce gelir. Lütfen {name}..." {n}Bir saniyeliğine tereddüt ediyor. Ardından elini tutup dudaklarına götürüyor. Parmaklarını hafifçe öpüyor.{/n} "Şu anki konumumuzda... Daha fazlasına müsaade edemem. Aynısı senin için de geçerli. İzin ver... Sadece yanında olayım, yardımcı olayım. O kadarı bana yeter."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix inclines his head slightly and begins to speak more quietly:{/n} "Being near you is a trial for me. A trial I was not prepared for, and so even speaking of it is... difficult for me. As it always is when it concerns my own desires, rather than my responsibilities and obligations. My duty comes first, even before myself. Please, {name}..." {n}He hesitates for a second. Then he takes your hand, brings it to his lips, and tenderly kisses your fingers.{/n} "In our position, I can allow myself... very little. And for you it is no different, really. Just... let me be here for you and help you. That is more than enough for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, başını hafifçe eğip daha sessiz konuşuyor:{/n} "Yanında durduğum her an bir sınav. Hem de hiç çalışmadığım bir sınav. Öyle ki... Bunları söylerken bile çok zorlanıyorum. Gerçi söz konusu sorumluluğum yahut yükümlülüğüm değil de arzularım olduğunda hep zorlanırım. Vazifem her şeyden, kendimden bile önce gelir. Lütfen {name}..." {n}Bir saniyeliğine tereddüt ediyor. Ardından elini tutup dudaklarına götürüyor. Parmaklarını hafifçe öpüyor.{/n} "Bu konumumuzda... Daha fazlasına müsaade edemem. Aslında aynısı senin için de geçerli. İzin ver... Sadece yanında olayım, yardımcı olayım. O kadar bana yeter."
